channel.title: [Release] Project-elder And RSCLegend Source
channel.description:
-------------------Info----------------------- I release these to server who had the same owners, first of all Domdom11. he can't do anything RSC related and always asked for my help so its I would say Project-elder source is my own.... but blaming me for inplanting buggs was to much so fuck this wast of time I put into hes/mine discusting source--Thats the life of RSCI don't care..
Just to make him mad I didn't delete the players folder:) Happy holiday DOM!
if this gets deleted PM and I will send you a link to the download.
Project-elder download link: http://uppit.com/v/ZZPRJKFB Had to remove the players folder but I will still have it available for those who want.
RSCLegends dowload link: http://www.mediafire.com/?zitmq4nmdma

Someone maby can clean it from spam posts?[/quote]

item.title: [Release] Project-elder And RSCLegend Source
item.dc:creator: @Officer-Ahole Officer-Ahole
item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

[quote=“Krypton, post:75, topic:333245”][quote author=Officer-Ahole link=topic=429657.msg3155565#msg3155565 date=1269014356]

f 2 p 2 p f: You probably right but damn we can get one day without some cocky shit coming from kryptix.
I’m not flaming and wasn’t my attention to make this a joke-thread.

Releasing a source that is the exact same as noobscape v3 with a few xml updates makes it a joke-thread.

and you forgot the whole meaning of this release, retard.

-------------------Info-----------------------
I release these to server who had the same owners, first of all Domdom11. he can’t do anything RSC related and always asked for my help so its I would say Project-elder source is my own… but blaming me for inplanting buggs was to much so fuck this wast of time I put into hes/mine discusting source–Thats the life of RSCI don’t care…

Whole meaning? Can anyone even understand what your trying to say in your first post? The whole release of this is because your mad at domdom or whatever his name is for blaming you on implanting bugs, but that’s still is BESIDES THE POINT of you posting the source that’s already posted on these forums with a few xml updates. So therefore this thread is just a joke.

I’m not defending snoopy at all - I know he belongs in one of those special classes, but he released the sources with the database still in them. I don’t know if those servers are online now, and if they are then that did some damage. Also to those who played those 2 servers and played other servers with the same password, they’re more than likely to get fucked. It doesn’t look like he intentionally did that, I guess it just worked out that way and he went along with it.
Also I doubt that ‘domdom11’ guy wanted the source to be released, so that might have pissed him off.
[/quote]
All the more reason for this thread to be called a joke?[/quote]

The OP of this thread, yes, he is a joke. What isn’t a joke is what it turned out to be; People may be getting scammed because of him.

Read full topic

[quote=“Kryptix, post:5, topic:333266”][quote author=Officer-Ahole link=topic=429657.msg3155565#msg3155565 date=1269014356]@Kryptix - Dude, for the love of god, will you. Shut. The. Fuck. Up. No one, especially here on moparscape, gives a flying fuck what that little brain of yours thinks.
WHY do you think your server is attacked every damn day, by viruses, DDoS, or whatever the case may be? You claim you’re smart, but you continue to do ALL the wrong things to further piss people off, and then you blame it on “jealousy”. Your mouth is your downfall, learn how to shut it.
[/quote]
